room_title: Escape room "Caribbean Pirate Ship" by Philadelphia Room Escape in Philadelphia
review: I went with my cousins a couple weekends ago and we had a great time. We liked the Pirates theme and escaped! We got to speak with the woman running the place and she was very personable. I would recommend this place for a fun afternoon with friends or a team-building with colleagues.

room_title: Escape room "Caribbean Pirate Ship" by Philadelphia Room Escape in Philadelphia
review: The experience was great. We played both rooms by Philadelphia Room Escape. The interaction is good and the design of the puzzle is unbelievably awesome. It took us one and a half hour to escape from two rooms. I will suggest this to my friends.

room_title: Escape room "Caribbean Pirate Ship" by Philadelphia Room Escape in Philadelphia
review: These were one of the best escape rooms I have ever had in Philadelphia. Had a great experience with my friends and enjoyed the two themes very much. Some parts might be a little tricky but it turns out to be interesting after finding the truth. Highly recommend to other friends.
